import React, { useState } from 'react' import Tilt from 'react-parallax-tilt'; import {Container,Row,Col} from 'reactstrap' const Banner = () => { const [sideSection, setSideSection] = useState(false); const [profileSection, setProfileSection] = useState(false); const sidesection = () => { if (!sideSection) { setSideSection(true) document.querySelector('.side-section').classList.add('d-block') } else { setSideSection(false) document.querySelector('.side-section').classList.remove('d-block') } } const profilesection = () => { if (!profileSection) { setProfileSection(true) document.querySelector('.profile-section').classList.add('d-block') } else { setProfileSection(false) document.querySelector('.side-section').classList.remove('d-block') } } return (
